introduction: 高中生葵和母亲过着节俭的生活。有一天，在放学回家的路上葵看到萌子住在一座洋馆里，他被萌子所吸引，开始在院外偷看她。当他继续窥视，他看到了萌子充实的生活和他自己贫乏的生活。但隔壁的草坪真的是蓝色的吗？Aoi, a high school student, lives a frugal life with her mother. One day, He is attracted to Moeko, who he sees at her Western-style building on his way home from school, and begins her peeping. But as he continued to peep, he saw her fulfilling life and his own underprivileged life. Is the lawn next door really blue?
